objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.

history.p: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

lg.l:
prathama mudraṇa
1970
mudrākara
śrī caudhurī śibarāma dāśa, em. e.
śatadaḷa pres
kaṭaka-9

1| prajāṅkaṭhāru yudhiṣṭhiṅkara bidāẏa,
parīkṣitaṅku rājanīti śikṣā, subarṇṇa cūḍi
o kaḷiyuga bibaraṇa ... 1

2| suhāṇī kanyā śikhareśvara śiba
sebāre niyukta gaurī gopāḷuṇī
beśe kr̥ttibāsa o kīrttibāsa daityaṅka
saṁhāra ... 30

3| yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara uttara diga tīrthe gamana,
apratiṣṭhā ḍākeśvarī bibaraṇa,
astraśastrādi tyāga ... 43

4| himabanta parbate draupadī, sahadeba,
nakuḷa, arjuna o bhīmaṅkara tanutyāga ... 55

5| yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara narka darśana o chaẏāṇoi
sahasra rājāṅkara mukti ... 74

6| śvāna rūpe dharmaṅkara prabeśa,
yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara indraṅku staba, byāghra
darśana o kaḷiyugara niryyātanā ... 76

7| yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara dharma parīkṣā o svaśarīre
svarga gamana ... 88

{@sāraḷā mahābhārata
svargārohaṇa parba
prajāṅkaṭhāru yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara bidāẏa,
parīkṣitaṅku rājanīti śikṣā,
subarṇṇa cuṛi o kaḷiyuga bibaraṇa@}
agasti muniṁka caraṇe kalāka dibya pūjā | 1 |
aśvamedha yāga kr̥ṣṇa svargārohaṇa uttāreṇa kathā
kahibā bho ruṣi mote pāṇḍabaṁka byabasthā | 2 |
lg.note: prathama dhāḍire nimnalikhita bhinma bhinma pothire bhinma pāṭha :–
ẏethu anantare bilaṁka deśa rājā
agastiṁka padmapāde kale dibya pūjā |
nistarili muni tumbhara bākya śuṇi
ẏethu anantare kathāẏe kaha brahmamuni |
bauda rūpe kr̥ṣṇa nīḷagirire bijekaḷe
tahuṁṇa pāṇḍaba ye kebaṇa kr̥tya kale |+
badanti agasti śuṇimā brahmamuni
yujheṣṭhi debe rājya pūjā gheni |
aneka āẏojana ye ratnamāna dile
samasta rājya prajāṁku binoẏī kahile |
agasti bolanti śuṇa bilaṁka nr̥pamaṇi
ẏethu anantare śuṇa svargārohaṇa bāṇī | ‘ṭa, jha, cha’ pothi

lg.l: driyodhana māri rājya kale kaḷiyugara madhye
āṭhaśata baraṣa helā ẏeṇe kr̥ṣṇa gale badhe | 6 |
kr̥ṣṇara galā uttāre baraṣa śata dui
kaha mahāmuni mote svarga ārohaṇa bāṇī
pātra mantrī amanātya sanya ye prohita
bābu tumbhe sakaḷa jane śuṇimā mora bāṇī
kahai tumbhanta yebe āmbhara pūrba kāryya | 13 |
kṣamā karibāka ẏebe se doṣa mohori | 14 |
ẏe doṣa mohora kṣamā karibā samasta | 15 |
lg.note: yesaneke yujheṣṭhi bacana paramāda |(ka)

lg.l: kiñchita puṇye mor abahuta dharma bāñcchā | 16 |
candreṇa yesane aṭai tārā ye bidita
ẏe mohora lakṣmī yebe parīkṣaku dei
yujheṣṭhi bacana śuṇi samasta bismaẏa mana
āmbhanta chaḍi nr̥pati kāhiṁki karibu gabana | 21 |
āmbhe bane yāi samaste tumbhanta karibuṁ sebā
tāhāra yete doṣa kale mote upekṣibā | 24 |
bābu prajā pāḷile barddhuta hoai yaśaśrī āẏuṣe | 27 |
lg.note:
parajāṁku yeuṁ rājā pāḷaiṭi dharme
ariṣṭhi abidhi na thāi deba dharme |[abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
lg.l: parajāku yebaṇa rājā pāḷai putra tule
rājā pāḷile se parajā hoi susta
dīrgha pañchabiṁśa prati pañchabiṁśa naḷa uṭhi
ẏemanta ghana karante hoiba ẏeka bāṭi | 32 |
bāṭikare saṁjā ghenima ẏeka ye pauṭi | 33 |
yatane kahile samasta rājyara subidhāna kathāmāna | 34 |

lg.note: [pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
parajāṁku yebaṇa rājā pāḷai samatule
deba indra se rājye pāḷai jāṇa bhale |(cha)
kṣetara taṭaku kara ẏeka tule |(ka, ṭa, jha, cha, ḍa)

lg.l: laṅgaḷa gheniṇa se bhūmi karai karaṣaṇa | 40 |
laṅgaḷa pheḍilā uttāre paṇḍāẏe dileka kodāḷa
ẏe budā hāṇiṇa tu pākāa bhūmiki
kheta sampūrṇṇa hou bhūmi hou niki | 42 |
āgyāṁ dei bidujana galā nija pure
khḷāi kiriṣāṇa budāi pakāi dūre dūre | 43 |
paṇḍāẏe boile nia yā tohora gharakaiṁ | 46 |
kr̥ṣi se āmbhara nā aṭai yugate
karme se yebe pāilu bebhāra aṭai tote | 47 |
anna basra barttana huai yete mote
tumbhra āẏe bitta muṁ nemaiṁ kemante | 51 |
lg.note: kiriṣāṇa = kr̥ṣāṇa |
niki = bhala |
pathara kādhante pāilā ratna jhāli (pāilā ratnatuḍi)(ṇa)
tumbhara āẏe bitta = tumbhara se bitta |

lg.l: ẏeteka chanda bandha se tumbhara baḍapaṇa | 54 |
bāra cinā barttane anna basre muṁ kāreṇi
rājāra chamure yāiṁ guhāri karibi ẏehikṣaṇi | 55 |
brāhmaṇa boilā bege mathāre ghena ẏehā
āho caitana brāhmaṇa kariṣāṇa duhiṁkara kaḷi
dhana gheni duheṁ yujheṣṭhi debaṁka chamure yāiṁ miḷi | 57 |
brāhmaṇa boilā deba ẏe mohora kiriṣāṇa
ẏe mohora upare dekhāucchi chanduāḷa paṇa | 59 |
sureśvara boilā deba ẏe mohora kiriṣāṇa
kodāḷa dei boili ẏe budāmāna hāṇa | 61 |
hāṇante tahiṁr̥ pāilā ẏe amūlya ratna nidhi
bho deba ratna ẏehāra hoibanā bidhi | 62 |
ẏehāra arajilā dhana ẏe mohora upare pakāi | 63 |
lg.note: rājāra chamuku chāla yibā se bichāra karibe yāhā |(ka)
lg.l: yujheṣṭhi debe boile yebe pāilu ratnajāli (jhari)
dhana na nei kimpe brāhmaṇa tule dvanda kari | 64 |
kiriṣāṇa boilā deba muṁ karai bepāra
anna basra baratana hoai sinā mora | 65 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ho adhe adhe kara
kiriṣāṇa boilā deba tumbhe se dharmarāẏe
brāhmaṇa boilā muṁ cināẏe kimpe nebi
ẏehu dukhe arjilā muhiṁ kesane haribi | 69 |
kaḷiyuga prabeśa hoilā śuṇimā tathya kathā | 72 |
kaḷiki paśi na dile sahadeba jagannāthe | 75 |
lg.note: kiriṣāṇa boilā muṁ kiṁpe karibi abebhāra |(ḍa)
ẏehu dukhe arjilā muṁ kisa karibi |(śa, ḍa, cha)
lg.l: ākāśara bāṇī paḍilā śuṇa he sahadeba
anīti paḍibaṭi tumbhe na thāa ẏeba | 76 |
yujheṣṭhi deba ākāśe ye naile nohai
dharmarājā na thile ākāśa na śohai | 78 |
sureśara brāhmaṇa boilā ẏe dhana mohora boli
paḷā yāa sādhuta boli kiriṣāṇa dilā peli | 81 |
brāhmaṇa bolai deba tumbhe ye dharmarāẏe
kiriṣāṇa mātra hoi sādhuku baḷa kaẏe | 82 |
sahadeba boilā yeuṁ dinuṁ kr̥ṣṇa dūtapaṇe gale
mote hakāri deba kr̥ṣṇa ye boilā | 86 |

lg.note:
tumbhe nathāanti anīti paḍiba
anīti paḍibaṭi tumbhe nathiba kaḷiyuga |(cha, ṭa)
sureśvara brahmāṇa boilā ẏe mora arjilāra jāli |(ṭa, ṇa)
kiriṣāṇa mātra hoi baḷatkāra kaẏe |(jha, cha)
jāri = jāla |
lg.l: ẏete boli deba kaḷiyuga bandhana kalu āmbhe
yujheṣṭhi boile kimpe kaḷiyuga hoiba anitya | 89 |
parīkṣa boile deba pr̥thīre thilā sunā
bichārile yugate ẏe rājāra bhaṇḍāra dhana sinā | 90 |
bhaṇḍāre dhana thoile yujheṣṭhi na boile kicchi | 91 |
nāna chanda pāti rājā nema duirāśi | 93 |
indra br̥ṣṭi na kariba pr̥thī nohiba phaḷadāẏe | 94 |
rājā hoibe śāguṇā parajā hoibe maḍā
ṭhāba ṭhāba hoi se uṭhibāka paḍā | 96 |
brāhmaṇa stirī yonire chāṇḍāḷe debe bīryya | 100 |
lg.note: rājasebā karibe daṇḍapāṭa ācari |(ṭa, ṇa)

lg.l: bidhabā stirī gheni karibe kuḷa rakṣā | 102 |
bidhāba ramaṇe ye putra hoibāka jāta
sukhare strī rati karibe chāri jāti
putra sādhaba pitā mariba anna śāsti | 104 |
bhaṇḍapaṇa kari tahiṁ britibe ye thoke | 105 |
pitā putra patnīre hoibe ẏeka saṅga
āpaṇāra nija br̥tti chaḍibe śakya hīne
brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷa ye ẏekatve madirā rase arthī | 110 |
michahuṁ sata jane na kahiba bāṇī
ocha loke siṁghāsane basibe pātra mantrī jāṇi | 112 |
lg.note: hiṁsāre anyoanyi maribāka jane |(tha)
bāmapūjā kari pāibe akīrtti |(ḍa)
brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷa ye madirā arthe māti |(ṇa)
cauryyapaṇe prabartti hoibe sakaḷe |(cha)

lg.l: abichāre rājā ye aneka śira hāṇi | 114 |
niẏata triẏā chaḍi nare hoibe anyāchārī
saṁtrānti amābai rātre karibe anna bhojana | 118 |
nija āṣya gheniye kehi na bratiba | 119 |
santāna nimante brāhmaṇī śūdra saṅge rata
se chāṇḍāḷa putre hoibe beda pāraga niẏata | 123 |
tāhākaiṁ na miḷiba annabasra dhana yue santāna | 125 |
lg.note: śūdra jane āchāra karibe niẏata |(ṇa)
lg.l: bolanti yujheṣṭhi ẏe ta baḍāi aniryyāpa
ẏe bhūmire thāiṁ kimpe bābu arajibā pāpa | 126 |
bho rājana kointāra putre ye rājya tejyā kari
sehi dina kanyā janma hoithilā bhoga | 133 |
tāhāku rāiṇa ye gaṇāilā hari sāhu
dohitāra janma nakṣatra nāma yāhā kahu | 135 |
lg.note: bho rājana karṇṇakeśarī boli nr̥pabara
tāhāra duhitā ye kāñchī nāma tāra |
tāhāku parīkṣitaku bibhā karāile
śrīdharmarāja abhiṣeka kari śāḍhi dile |
citrotpaḷā nadī tāre ye yāja nāme nagrī |(ka, cha, tha, jha, ṭha, ṛa)
pare ‘ṭa, jha’ pothira pāṭhāntara :–
amarābatī nagre hari sāhara baṁśa
suhāṇī boli tāra duhitā guru haṁsa |
pañchadaśa helā bibhā na dilāka sehu |(ja)

lg.l: baḍāi bhāgyabantī ẏe tote puṇya yaśa | 136 |
ẏekā kathāẏe mātra tote kahai biśvāsa
ẏehā śuṇi bibhā na karai hari sāhu
hari sāhu pāṇḍabaṁka chamure yāiṁ miḷe | 139 |
candra udaẏa prāẏe diśai se bāḷa banitā | 140 |
yujheṣṭhi pachāranti śuṇasi ho hari baśya
śuṇiṇa baśya ye tāhāṁka caraṇe pariṇāmi
bibhā nihāi hoi ẏe dohitā mora svāmī | 142 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tu śuṇasi ho baśya
ẏe tohora baṁśaku aṭai baḍa doṣa | 143 |
hari sāhu boilā deba mohora manda karma
teṇukari bibhā ẏehāku na karai bho deba | 146 |
ẏe kathā sata ki bābu bujhani pratakṣa | 147 |
lg.note: pañchadaśa helā bibhā na helāka sehu |(ja)
se dohitā pāka śroṇi pitr̥loke pitr̥loke pibanti |(ja, gha, ḍha)

mohora putra nāhiṁ ẏeka dohitā goṭi
snehe bibhā na karai bho deba yujheṣṭhi |(cha)
lg.l: sahadeba boile deba niścaẏa ẏe aṭai
hari sāhu karai caraṇe binaẏa daẏinī | 149 |
svāmīra satya bāchā heu udita heu dharma
baśya kuḷaku kathā rahu janma janma | 152 |
ẏe kathāku deba nakara tumbhe nāhiṁ | 153 |
rājya bhoge teji ailu āsi ātmā hoẏe śeṣa | 154 |
yācilā kanyā pradāna hebā miḷai ẏehi bidhi | 156 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile ye ẏehāku hoibā pradāna
yama bhaẏaru se kanyā rakhibāku ke hoiba bhārjana | 158 |
yamara bhaẏaru deba pārai muhiṁ rakhi | 159 |
lg.note: yujheṣṭhi boile āmbhara taḷita baẏasa |(ṇa, jha, ṇa)
rājya bhoga āsi hoilā āmbhara śeṣa |(ṛha, ja, gha)

sahadeba kahile ẏehā nakara birodhi
yācilā kanyā bibhā hoibā yogāi ẏebidhi |(ṇa, ka, tha)
lg.l: rājusi yagyaṁ kāḷe muṁ nimantraṇe gaẏe
tā tahuṁ rakṣā karabi nakara mane bhrānti | 161 |
tu yebe rakṣā kari pāribu yamaku
bandhu bāndhabanta ruṇḍa kalāka hari sāhu
jīiṁle jīuṁ pache male maru bāḷī
āpaṇe byāsa muni prabeśa hele āsi | 168 |
sīukāra baraṇa ye hari sāhu kalā
bāṇijyā nāme karaṇa prīti nāme yoga
yugate hari sāhu gandha ye baṇiā
gandharāja juāda agara kasturī candana guguḷi
kuṁkumara tule ye karpūra guṇḍi boḷi | 177 |
hari sāhu baṇiā koḷe ye suhāṇī
kanyākaiṁ nia ho ahigyaṁ pūjāku yugate | 180 |
goḍāi arjuna ye kanyāra pacha pacha | 183 |
ahigyaṁ sthāne bāñcchā sāri kanyāku bege āṇi | 185 |

lg.note: kuśabaṭa ārohaṇakaleka prohite |(kṣa, ta, ja, ba)

lg.l: yahuṁ kuśa bandhana kaleka beni hātha
śūnyeṇa miḷile kāḷa bikāḷa yamara beni dūta | 188 |
khāṇḍeba bana dahante ye arjuna pāi kāḷaphāśi
se śara gheni arjuna binddhala ātreṣi | 189 |
kāḷa bikāḷa beni dutaṁku kalāka bandhana | 190 |
bhaẏe paḷāile tahuṁ citra ye gupate
svāmī hari sāhu jhia nāma tāra suhāṇī
se kanyāku bibhā ye hoile yujheṣṭhi
śuṇiṇa kopa ye kalā yantu nāśakara
maiṁṣī bāhane ye bije kāḷa daṇḍadhara | 195 |
kareṇa kāḷadaṇḍa phāśa gheniṇa bege āsi
bibhā dekhi yama kāḷa bikāḷanta peṣidilā | 198 |
arjuna ṭhākure bandhana kale kāḷa bikāḷaṁku
āpaṇe bije kale nāśakara kanyā prāṇa haribāku | 199 |

div.note: āpaṇe bije kale kanyāku nemāku |(ja, ba, gha, ḍa)

lg.l: śuṇiṇa hari sāhu ye hoilā tāṭakā
yujheṣṭhi debaṁka mane lāgilā baḍa śaṁkā | 200 |
dhaumya prohite ye byāsa ka sahite
bidhabā ātmā prāẏe hoi bisarile samaste | 201 |
arjuna boilā deba sukhe hoa bibhā
yamara kathāku deba bhaẏa na karibā | 202 |
arjunara bacane ye phiṭilā mana bhrānti
huḷahuḷi śabada ye śubhilā gagana gati | 203 |
saṁsāra nāśa karantā tu kr̥tānteka debatā
sakaḷa jībajantu kara tuhi se bihantā bidhātā
tohora bhaẏe hari sāhu yujheṣṭhiṁki dilāka duhitā | 205 |
tuhi deba jagata jantu kara nāśa
nirbhaẏe puruṣa saṁjībatī hoẏe yāra bāsa | 207 |
pracaṇḍa durddaṇḍa tora kāḷa ye bikāḷa | 208 |
tu deba kāḷānaḷa aṭu ye aśānti | 209 |
tāraṇa puruṣa tuhi aṭu ho nirddaẏe
pr̥thī āpa teja bāẏabya ākāśa nirbhaẏe | 210 |
lg.note: tu ẏebe ẏehākaiṁ nakara maraṇa |(ba, jha, ḍha)

abatāra puruṣa tu se aṭu nirudaẏe
pr̥thī āpa teja bāibya ākāśa tohore se bhiāẏe |[ka]

lg.l: ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍa tohora udara bhitara | 211 |
chāẏāra bacane tohora caraṇe gaḷutakuṣṭha byādhi
bhūta preta pichāśa gaṇare yāhāra hoẏe ṭhaṇā
bāma naẏana yama ḍāhāṇa naẏana anaḷa
svāmī anaṅga sundara puruṣa tu kaḷā gorā dhabāḷā śyāmaḷā
nānā barṇṇa rūpa tuhi se mahākhaḷā | 216 |
meda medā māẏeṁse karddana yāra piṇḍa
ẏekā śarīra tohora satva raja tama
mātā raja pitā bīryya yetebeḷe mātā garbhe rahu

lg.note: bhūta preta pichāśa yāhāra gaṇanā |[cha, ṛa, ka, ṇa, ṭha]
bihantā puruṣa tu pitāmahara kulaṇa |[ja, gha, ḍha]
sarba sañchilā nātha udaẏe mārataṇḍa |[ṭa, ka, cha, ṇa]

bairāśi = beḷaka bhojanakārī
bairasya = saṁsāra biṣaẏa prati nispr̥hatā
baināśya = bairāśa = bairāśi
janma karma ādhāna bairāśi

lg.l: svāmī keśa ūrddhva bandhana ghana ūrddhva danta
ūrddhva caraṇe hoẏe ūrddhva yāra reta | 222 |
muṁ kehne barṇṇibi hāde tohora mahimāṁ | 224 |
byākuḷa ākuḷa ye hoile tora pitā
muhiṁ yāhā srijibi tuhi sinā sākṣī
bihantā tārantā tuhi sinā nātha ẏekī | 227 |
svāmī muhiṁ se ye dvārapāḷa kapiḷāsa svarge
māneba janma muhiṁ śrīrāmaṁka kiñchita anurāge | 228 |
ẏe mohora kathāku nātha tuhi se aṭu sākṣī | 229 |
gata āgata sañchita nātha muhiṁ tohora anurāgī
haraṇa tāraṇa nātha tuhi se aṭu ẏekā
hata gata pāñjiru mora nāma kiḷipakā | 231 |
kaḷi dharma udita boli nakara mote kopa
āpaṇe kiḷipakā mora agyāna beḷa pāpa | 232 |
lg.note: apacchāti puruṣa tuhi se deba puṇi |(ṇa)
byākuḷa ānanda ye rodana tora pitā |(tha, ṇa, ka, ṭa, ta)

lg.l: gyāna agyāne mora yeteka thilā pāpa
bhāratha yuddhe muṁ māili aneka ye nr̥pa | 234 |
svāmī gyāna agyāne mora yisa pāpa
na kalaiṁ gopyāna muṁ tumbhaṁku kahili sarūpa | 235 |
mānaba janma muhiṁ māgibāku nuhai kṣama
taba daṇḍu mote uddhari dhara deba yama | 236 |
muhiṁ ki sañchapi kahi pāribāku śakye | 237 |
tohora āgyāṁẏe mohore prāpata ruddhi suddhi | 238 |
māẏā paṭaḷa saṁsāra ẏe na sarai kāḷa
śrīkr̥ṣṇara dāsa muṁ ye muni abatāra | 240 |
badaẏanti śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa śaraṇa yama daibate | 241 |
he budhajane yama debatā stuti śuṇa
nitye sādhana kale ẏekatva hoẏe piṇḍaprāṇa | 242 |
tumbhe boliba abā āpaṇe na sādhi
āpaṇe adhama tu paraku kaha buddhi | 243 |
mātāṁka karma kahilu boi bighnarāja kopakale | 247 |
tr̥tīẏa janmare muṁ sāroḷa dāsa kabi
āra janmare puṇi mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe janmibi | 250 |
āho janme janme padara lakṣa biṣṇu kaḷāre bhakata
chāri janme hoiba ye ṣāṭhaẏe lakṣa grantha | 251 |
ṣāṭhiẏe lakṣa grantha kahibi marttyara bhmabane
tebe se basibi yāiṁ śibadvāra sthāne | 252 |
jātismara nuhai muṁ na jāṇai ẏehā
śūdramuni sāroḷā tuḷasāra ballabha nija dāsa
he budhajane mora janme janme abhyāsa
na jāṇai bedabidyā nohai muṁ kāhāri śiṣya | 254 |
he budhajane yama debatāra bacana śuṇa
nitya sādhana kale ẏekatva piṇḍa prāṇa | 255 |
yama debatā na ghenilā tāhāra daẏinī | 256 |

div.note: ār ajanme siddheśvara hoi janmabi |(gha, ḍha, ja)

āho janme janme biṣṇu lokaṁkar abhakata
chāriyuge hoiba ṣāṭhiẏe koṭi grantha |(gha, ḍha, ja)

lg.l: arjuna boilā svāmī ẏemanta nuhai muhiṁṭi doṣī
sahasre pura kari yama debatāku pakāilā bānddha | 259 |
tahiṁ bandhana kale nei yama daibata | 260 |
dharme ye rahile tahiṁ nāma dharma puraṭi | 261 |
hari sāhu yujheṣṭhi debaṁku karai ye pucchā
sahadeba boilā ho śuṇa hari sāhu
ẏethe yama debatāra ẏete darpa kahuṁ | 265 |
yama debatāra gaḷuta koṣṭha byādhi hoithilā pāde
gāḍheṇa paśilā āsi ẏe tohora pura | 267 |
tohor adohitāra prāṇa āpaṇe niante bānddha
kopeṇa arjuna ye tāhāku kale bandī | 268 |
hari sāhu boilā yama debatāṁku dekhāibā svāmī mote | 269 |
bho yama debatā mote karibā kāraṇe | 271 |
yete dina pariyante āmbhe thibuṭi ẏetha
ẏe bhmabanaku tumbhara na paśibaṭi dūta | 275 |
yama debatā boilā ẏe mora satyasatyi
mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe ẏe nagra nāma amarābatī | 276 |
śuṇa āhe budhajane mu yāhā kahili
teṇu se amarābatī nāma dharmapura boli | 277 |
hari sāhuku boile māga mote bara | 278 |

div.note: mr̥tyu nohiba ẏe bhmabana amarābatī |(ja, ṭha, ḍha)

“harisāhuku boile māga mote bara” ehāpare ‘ḍha, gha’
pe thire dirgha pāṭhāntara :–
kara yoḍi sāhu kale jantuṁka īśvara |
tumbhara daṇḍaku muṁ sadā bhaẏe kari |
ẏe mohor aboṅgṇe prabhma daṇḍa na bihiba
mohora doṣa kṣamā kari ẏehi bara deba |
pāṇḍabe bijekale tumbhaṁku tāribāku puṇa |[abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: hari sāhu boilā mohora ye baśya jāti
tohora yamadaṇḍe kehi na pāibe śāsti | 279 |
hari sāhu boilā śate aṣṭauttara āẏuṣa
ẏeteka pūrile ye āmbhe yibuṁ kapiḷāsa | 280 |

div.note: ẏe kanyā bibhā hebāku kṣama niki āna
ẏe kanyā yogaru tuhi tarilu bahana |
sakaḷa pāparu tu ye hoibu mukata |
putra jāta heba tora kuḷaku uddhraṇa |
śate janma pāpa tāra kṣaṇake nāśa yāi |
ye abā śrī mahābhāratha kare uccāraṇa
ẏekamana hoi ye saṁśaẏa na kariba |
pādāsana dei tāṁku santoṣa karāi |[abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: ẏe kathā āu anyathā nohibāka tebe | 281 |
tohora jātiki tiāri thāa ye sabunti
sva jātire āu kehi nohibe anīti | 282 |

div.note: tāra puṇya ke kahiba jiṇai jagata |
biṣṇura mandire yāi se jana basai
yāhā bāñcchā thāi mane se bhoga karai |
yehu se saṁśaẏa kare śrī mahābhārathe
muhiṁ tāhāra prāṇaku niai baḷe dhari
nānā jāti daṇḍa muhiṁ se diai
ye bhāratha uccāre muṁ tāhāku ḍarai |
se grāmare paśi nuāranti mora dūta |
se yoge yebaṇa prāṇī labhinti maraṇa |[abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: lābha lāi kahiba se na kahiba mithyā | 283 |
chāri pāde kiṇiba bikiba pāñcha pāde
puṇya mārge thiba na paśibe apramāde | 285 |

div.note: tāra pāpamāna ye sakaḷa nāśa yāi
kahai bho mantrī kaha śrī mahābharatha
ẏe se ādyapaboṅg ye āmbhara baṁśa guṇa |
samudra manthanuṁ ye candramā helā jāta
candrara nandana aṭe budha nāma bīra

lg.l: ẏeteka kariba yehu tahiṁ nāhiṁ pāpa | 286 |
yama boilā ẏe mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe deśa marahaṭa(?)
se nagra bhitare basai mahā mahā hāṭa | 287 |
śabara tahuṁ māṁsa gheni bikai hāṭare
sabu dine bāṇijya brata hetu kalā
māẏeṁsa biṇijuṁ se āna na śikhilā | 291 |
sata kahi chāri kāhāṇare chāripaṇa araja | 292 |
bhārijā putra goṭiẏe āpaṇe tini prāṇī
satyahuṁ mithyā kehi na kahanti bāṇī | 293 |
nakṣatra hoi basilā kārttika puñji kati | 294 |
para dārā kathāku paśita na debu | 295 |
anya jāti stirīṁka tumbhe na chuiṁba aṁga

div.note:
yama boile ye mr̥tu maṇaḷare kapaṭa
ujāṇi deśa baṁśa karṇṇāṭa marahaṭa(?) |(ja, gha, ḍha, ha)

svadārā tra ẏāre se aṭai satyabratī |(ka, ḍa)
sva dārā ẏe śr̥ṅgāre aṭai satyabratī |(gha, ḍha, ja)

bibhūti bhūṣaṇa ye jaṭā kamaṇḍaḷa |(gha, ḍha, ja)
bibhūta lepana ye jaṭā kamaṇḍaḷa |(ka, ḍa)
sadhyā abaśeṣe se nohibāka saṁga |(ka, ṭha, jha)

lg.l: biṣṇuṁku upāsanā kariba nitya ye bidhāne
hatyā bibāda badha na yibāka dekhi
bahuta lābha dekhi na yibāka bideśe
muṁ ẏehā kahili siddha sāroḷā prasanne | 301 |
baśya pāpa kale mukata bāṭa na diśi | 303 |
yāha se yama debatā kahile sarūpa
āpaṇāra nija karme thile na lāgai pāpa | 304 |

div.note:
he sugyaṁjane thiba śāhāsra bidhāne
ẏeteka thile deba dharma na chaḍai bhale dine |(gha, ja, ḍha)

lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
tīrtha sebi yibā ẏethe kisa praẏojana | 3 |
ẏe bhrathakhaṇḍa madhye acchi kebaṇa gupata tīrtha | 4 |
lomaśa boile tumbhe āmbhara tule āsa
kāḷa kāma sama soma ādhāna priẏa nidrā sātaputra
niśāre kaṭu āḷa ẏe rakhanti banasta | 8 |

div.note:
sañjibanī purakaiṁ galeka jantunāthe
rahile pāṇḍabe haraṣa mana citte |(tha, ṇa, jha, ḍa, ṭa)
brahmāṇḍa madhyare acchi bhmabana kapiḷāsa |(ṭa, ṇa, jha, ḍa, ka)
ẏe sāteheṁ niśākāḷe rakhanti gaganapatha |(ja, ba, ṛha)

lg.l: dhana dei tāṁku triputi kari nuāranti | 9 |
śrī āṣya dhana dei poṣai yehu beśyā
kobera bhaṇḍāru ye dhana cauryya kale
bho svāmī biśvanāta āmbhanta taba bhmabana debā | 14 |
mohora kapiḷāse tumbhe re pābaccha hoithāā | 15 |
mote draśana kari āsibe yete nara
dekha yāi kapiḷāsa śikhare īśvara basi | 18 |
āsa āsa bābu tote nemā sehi tīrtha

div.note:
sātaṁku kale nei bāseba āgara
kaḷiyuga āchāra ẏe saṁsāra bebhāra |(ja, ba, ḍha)

mote draśana kari āsibe yete jana
saburi pādaraja paḍu tumbhari śireṇa |(tha, ka, ba)

lg.l: ẏe bhrathakhaṇḍa madhye tote kiẏe nohe sari | 20 |
ẏe rājya pratipāḷiṇa thāasi bābu bhale
ẏehākaiṁ gheniṇa rājye tumbhe thāa māẏe
pañchu bhrātha dropatī sahita saja hoẏe | 23 |
sohāṇī nāmeṇa se hari sāhura duhitī
tāku saṅge gheniṇa gale dharmarāẏe nr̥pati | 24 |
parbatare uṭhi nuāriba ẏe baḷuta ye nārī | 25 |
sehu ṭhābare sehu siddha nāma hoile | 26 |
ẏebe nārāẏaṇī pāu pachai na sahuṁ | 27 |
bhīmakaiṁ kahile tu taṇḍuḷa guḍāẏe āṇa
sahasra māṇa taṇḍuḷa pañchana kara anna | 30 |
rātraka bañchibā āmbhe bhmañja śatapaḷa pañchāmr̥te

div.note: bhāta guḍāẏe āṇa bābu taṇḍuḷa sijhāa sehikṣaṇa |(ja, ba, ḍha, gha)

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi boile bābu ẏehā āṇilu ẏemante
kāhiṁre maḷibu tu baḷada kāhiṁ tote | 33 |
sahasre māṇa chāuḷa ghenilā sampādi kari | 36 |
āpaṇe rāndhaṇā tāhā kalāka ati bege
se parbata taḷe tāku ruhāile āṇi | 38 |
boile ẏehi parbatare thāi tu iśvaraṁku kara sebā
tahuṁṇa pāṇḍabe ye gale dakṣiṇa mūrati
se loka aneka doṣa kale tāṁku na debu tu śāsti | 44 |

div.note:
bānddha pakāi meli dilāka bhīmasena
sahasre māṇa taṇḍaḷa sampāda tahuṁṇa |(ja, ba, gha, ṛha)

lg.l: tahuṁṇa yujheṣṭhi debe dakṣiṇa bhāge gale | 45 |
lomaśa kahile ye gopyāna tīrtha prācī
ye nadīre srāhana kari aṣṭaśambhu dāhi | 51 |
asura bhaẏe boli indra debatā dile dīkṣā
rakṣa bhakṣa boli thile ẏethe beni ye danuja | 54 |
rakṣa bhakṣaṁkara putra heti ye praheti
bajrāṅgara nandana māḷī ye sumāḷī mālyabanta
ẏehāṁkara putra hoẏe kāḷī ye gopāḷī | 57 |
se gopāḷira nandana ye udaẏe bhānubanta
ẏekāmbara bane rahile kīrttana kīrttibāsa beni | 59 |
mr̥tikā parbataku se na galāka chaḍi | 60 |
gupata hoiṇa tumbhe bane thāi āreḍeki
gupata hoiṇa se baneṇa thāi ṭāki
nārada kahile indrakaiṁ mañcheṇa yāu śacī
yujheṣṭhi deba boile se kīrttana kīrttibāsa beni
tāhānta ke badhakalā kaha lomaṇa muni | 64 |
asuraṁka bhaẏe kehu na karanti ātayāte | 65 |
dinakare digambara boile śuṇa go pārbatī
pārbatī boile tumbhara āgyāṁ ye pāile
muṁ ẏehānta badha karibi tumbhe kopa ye nakale | 67 |
yāa boli āgyāṁ ye dile paśupati
kapaṭe pārbatī mathāre bahai dadhi ye nauta | 68 |
biṁjhagiri parbatare achanti kīrttana kīrttibāsa beni
ẏetekāḷe se ailā āmbhara ye puṇye | 70 |
āmbhakaiṁ dia go to dadhi ye nauti | 71 |
dhāna guṛāẏe bikinele bañchu pañchua parāṇī | 72 |
bolanti daẏite tu ye dhāna guḍāẏe beku
hīrā nīḷā nautiẏe pūrāi debu tuku | 73 |
āpaṇe patra gheni basile bhai beni
ẏekā dadhi nauti ye pūrilā garbhagate | 77 |
punarapi āu ki se pāibā ramaṇī | 82 |
sarba aḷaṁkāra aṅge mathāre dadhi ye nauti | 84 |
muni mana mohinī se asure kāhiṁ mr̥cchi | 85 |
boile durāntake āsa āsa go prāṇasahi | 86 |
daite boluchanti tu hua go āmbhara bāmā | 88 |
rāgeṇa bhāḷai muṁ kimpāi chaḍiṇa aili | 90 |
kīrttana trītibāsa boile kaha tumbhara ki oṣā
debaṁku dullabha hoile āmbhe pūroibuṁ manīṣā | 92 |
kiñchita se aṭai kahibāku baḍā lāja | 93 |
tu āmbhra bhāriyā āmbhe tohora prabhma
kahasi bedanā sakhi kāhāku ḍari tu bhābu | 94 |
pārbatī kahile duhiṁkara kandhe muṁ pāda deithibi
hāthe hāthe dei tumbhara muṇḍa muṁ dharithibi | 95 |
ẏeteka kale muṁ tumbha bhāriyā yugate | 96 |
mohe mohile debī asure paḍile mohabandhe
ẏekāmbara deba tāṁkara chamure yāiṁ miḷi
mahā baḷiṣṭha rūpe asuranta paẏare chāpi
ẏeteka dr̥śya thāu go dekhuthāuṁ sabunti | 103 |
kīrttana trītibāsa nāma dhari kṣatraku āmbhanta samaste | 104 |
tāhāṁkara dharmaru māgo āmbhanta adheka deasi
ẏekāmbra bane rahile beni ye rākṣasa | 107 |
mr̥ttikā giri śikhare prācī nadī taṭa | 108 |
kīrttana krītibāsa duhinti durgā nāśa kale
yujheṣṭhi boile ho chāla karibā tīrtha
pāṇḍabe pañcha tīrtha tahuṁ se boile | 112 |
kuṇḍa paśi srāhāna karante deba dharme
śaṅkha catra gadā ye śogai padmahasta
pāṇḍaba ghāṭare ye thoile tāṁku āṇi
pratakṣe nārāẏaṇa boli śubhilā ākāśara bāṇa | 115 |
bhīmasena boilā tumbhe mādhabe kara pūjā
niuna baḷa dekhi asura kalāka kaṭāḷa
āreḍaka piṭilā ye beni koṭhāra gheni
tinikośa osāra ye banasta cūra galā
mr̥ttikā giri śikhare bhīmakaiṁ āraḍeka māḍibasila | 123 |
bahai śroṇita ye gaḷai rome rome | 124 |

lg.note: nara bolikari dekhi asura kalāka kaṭāḷa |(ka, ṭha, jha, ṭa, ḍa)
āreḍeka sthānare = āraṇḍeka = eraṇḍa madhya pāṭha dekhāyāe

lg.l: chāḍilā ḍāka āraḍek abindhāṇa karma gheni | 126 |
caḷa pracaḷa hoi ye daita nuārilā
gadā nāhiṁ yeṇu mārai bajra mutha
beni pāda dhari bhīma bulāilā antarīkṣe
aśatāḷa utsarga ye mr̥ttikā nāme giri
brikodara na dekhi dhāmanti tini bhāi
āho yujheṣṭhi tu mādhaba gheni yā yā | 136 |
ẏe mādhaba pratimā tahiṁ upare bijekara
tebe se dānaba ye hoiba apahāra | 138 |
yujheṣṭhi mādhaba boli ẏehāra nāma heu | 139 |
śireṇa mādhaba bije jagatra kale trāhi | 141 |
bāḷa br̥ddha taruṇa pratakṣe tini rūpa
he paṇḍita jane hāde muṁ nuhai gyāṁtā
bidujana mukhe na śuṇili śāhāsra samghitā | 145 |
se pāṇḍaba ghāṭe srāhāna sāriṇa yujheṣṭhi
se mr̥ttikā giri upare yāi uṭhi | 146 |
bāḷa br̥ddha taruṇa rūpa dekhu ẏeka dine | 147 |
kisa kariba ho nānā tīrtha gabane
dharma artha kāma mokṣa yujheṣṭhi mādhaba draśane | 149 |
mādhaba sumara nare roga byādhi na pīḍu
mādhaba sumara nare kāḷadaṇḍa na paḍu | 150 |
mādhaba sumara nare haru sarba pāpa
mādhaba sumara nare siddha hou japa | 151 |
mādhaba sumara nare prāpata hou siddhi
mādhaba sumara nare prasara hou buddhi | 152 |
lg.note: tu deba sarba dharma sambharba kāḷe |(ba, ja, gha, ṛha)
lg.l: mādhaba sumara nare kāḷa kaḷaṁka na paḍu
mādhaba sumara nare hatyāhiṁ na pīḍu | 153 |
mādhaba sumara nare siddha hou sarba kāryya | 154 |
mādhaba sumara nare baddha bandhana phiṭu
mādhaba sumara nare āẏuṣa na tuṭu | 155 |
mādhaba sumara nare dhana santāna hou
mādhaba sumara nare dukha apāda kṣaẏa yāu | 156 |
ananta koṭi mahimāṁ yebaṇa yujheṣṭhi mādhaba
pañcha bhūte laẏakari mādhaba caraṇe seba | 157 |
prasanne abatāra ye baḷi darpa māḍi | 159 |
kaḷikāḷa jāṇi svāmī hoẏe yebaṇa sarūpa | 160 |
asaṁkhya mahimāṁ yāra na sarai kahante
yujheṣṭhi mādhaba caraṇe saẏaḷ ajana bandi | 162 |
mana bacana karttabye na paśu mora āna
śrī mahābhārata ẏe muni aṁśa bākye
ẏehā muṁ ghaṭaṇa karai yehne mora śakye | 164 |
lg.note:
sajjana jana sodara muniaṁśe gyāna |(ṭa, dha, jha, ja)
santhajana sodara muniaṁśe dhyāna (ja)

lg.l: badaẏanti śūdramuni saroḷā dāsa tuḷusāra ballabha mamahr̥de | 165 | 470 |
lg.head:
{@yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara uttara diga tīrthe gamana, apratiṣṭhā
ḍākeśvarī bibaraṇa astra śastrādi tyāga@}

lg.l: caḷanti pañchu bīre latā gahana kandara | 1 |
dekhile koṭharī ye rudra nadī tīre | 4 |
yeṇe se ẏekoiśabāra pr̥thī nichatra kari | 5 |
rudhire tarpaṇa kari bhairobī kale pūjā
pañchu pāṇḍabe ye tāṁku binaẏe bhagati
jaẏa tu koṭhāri go khaṇḍasi durgati | 7 |
jagujana mohinī go ghena mora sebā | 8 |
lg.note:
yuga yugāntare tumbhe aharniśi pūjā
jagata jana mohinī caraṇe seba yā yā |(ja, ḍha)

lg.l: namo namo mātā go sadā matuāḷī
jātā anta madhye abikāra yāra kaẏe
jaẏa tu caṇḍī chāmuṇḍā go abhaẏe triśūḷi
taba nāma muhiṁ go cintai tini oḷi | 12 |
agastiṁki pucchā kale baiba suta manu
svarga ārohaṇa kathā kahibā mote kumbharuṣi tanu | 14 |
se pāṇḍaba pāñchabhāi gale kāhiṁ puṇī | 15 |
rudra nadī tīre rahile pañchu pāṇḍaba dopatī | 16 |
ẏe nadī pāri hoi bujha ẏe kebaṇa tīrthabara | 17 |
dakṣiṇa kūḷe thāi re re kāra kari | 18 |

lg.note: namo namo mātā go sarbadā kheḍuāḷī |(ṇa, ka)
āgyāṁre brikodara hoilā nadī pāri
ẏe dakṣiṇa kūḷe yāi bhairobi mr̥tti dhari
ḍākai pāṇḍabre niścaẏa āja mala
ẏethiki aile tumbhara moḍibaiṁ śira
lg.l: arjuna ḍāka diai āsa bege bāhuḍiṭi
jāṇimā tumbhara darpa ẏebe ẏeṇiki āmbhere | 22 |
kebaṇa carita bābu ẏeta baḍa ariṣṭi | 23 |
sahadeba boile satyayuge mānadhātā yāga kale

lg.l: ẏethu anantare ye bilaṁka deśa rājā
basana kuṇḍaḷa nabaratnamāḷā puṣya candana dei
muniẏe śuṇimā yujheṣṭhi svarga ārohaṇa kathā
kebaṇa prakāre hoi jaṇe jaṇe male pañchu mahārathā | 3 |

lg.l: ghoḷa manthane yehne bāhāra hoai phena
dropatī bolanti deba ẏeṇe kāryya kisa | 13 |
yujheṣṭhi bolanti debī go yibā himabante
se yebe tejyākari gale ẏe bhmabana | 15 |
tuhi se kāraṇa nātha bihantā uddhārantā | 18 |
kṣudhā tr̥ṣā kalā mote nuārai yāi
ājaka rahibā ẏethi svāmī kāli yibā patha bāhi | 20 |
prāṇa yebe āmbhe ẏe tīrthe karibāna tyāga
āda go dropatī tumbhe annaku nakara āśa
parbata upare karibā aneka phaḷamūḷa grāsa | 23 |

prāṇaku ẏeṇe yebe karibā paritejyā
biṣṇu loke gaṇanā karibe debarājā |(ja, gha, ḍha, ba)

hā hā priẏā boli āliṅgana kalā
bhīmasena hāka diai rāẏe ba huḍiṇa āsa
kimpe dharma nr̥pati bimukha kimpe heu
nuhasi bimukha svāmī dekha tora bāmā
ẏehāku chaḍi yibāku kemante mana helā
yujheṣṭhi boile ho dropatīki chaḍiāsa bhīma
ye yāhāra gatire nirjita kalā karma | 31 |
āsa āsa bhīma chaḍa tāku koḷa
māẏā moha bandhana ye nohai ẏetebeḷa | 32 |

mahā bhr̥tyapaṇe ẏe tote kalāka sebā
svāmī śrīkhaṇḍī dhūṣṭadyumana aṭanti yāra bhrātha
aneka sambhare ẏehāku āmbhanta dileṭi dropata | 37 |
ẏekā stirīẏe hoi sahilā pāñchaṁkari ārddoḷi
ẏehāku chaḍiyibāku tumbhara sata keheneka baḷi | 39 |
svāmī chāmarīki nindaiṭi yāhāra ẏe keśa
lubudhe madhukare ye na chaḍanti yāra pāśa | 39 |
kusuma na gacchai mathāku hoẏe bhāri
aḷaṁkāra na bahai śarīraku bhārā pāiba boli | 40 |
svāmī nīḷendī daḷa jāṇi diśai yāra ākṣi
munigaṇe dhyāna chaḍibe yāhāra rūpa dekhi | 42 |

kambu jiṇikari svāmī kaṇṭha yāhāra śobhā
bāhu beni mr̥ṇāḷa ki kaṇaẏara prabhā | 44 |
subarṇṇa kumbha jāṇi yāha ra kuca yugaḷa
siṁha majhā jāṇi yāra hr̥daẏa br̥śāḷa | 45 |
śarata candra jāṇi yāhāra diśe tanu | 46 |
svāmī chālanteṇa śobhā ye mattagaja ṭhāṇi
bacana sulaḷita ye aṇḍira kokiḷa jāṇi | 48 |
svāmī ẏeteka lakṣaṇa jāṇi agniru hele jāta
ābara bho deba ẏe tumbhara pāṭabaṁśī | 50 |
aneka yāga yagyaṁ kala ẏehāntara gheni | 51 |
dharmarājāpaṇa keṇe galā pāṣāṇa kala hiẏā | 52 |

lg.l: ẏehāra chara pāiṁ bhaire ẏete tora śoka
ẏehā chara pāpīre aṭai ghora narka | 55 |
para upugārī hoẏe sarbadā yāra citta
ẏethe se jāṇimānā kāhāra kete puṇya | 58 |
ye yāhāra puṇya gheni yāi sinā svarga
śoka kale kāẏā tuhi hāribu na jāṇi
ke ẏethe amara hoi rahiba re bhāi
puṇya karithile ẏethe dukhanta na pāi | 61 |
kisa pātaka ẏehāra kuha he dharmarāṇa | 63 |
sadaẏe senehe ẏe na karai tumbhara
yujheṣṭhi boile se dropatī baḍu doṣā
pañchadaśa baraṣa keśa bandhana na kalā
ẏe mahā mahāpāpīki ture chaḍa mora bhāi
ẏe doṣa gheniṇa se kehu svarga yāi | 72 |
āmbhanta chaḍiṇa ẏebe na yāa dharmarāẏe | 73 |
nirmoha śarīra ẏe bikr̥ta tora mana
sahodra chaḍiṇa he na yāa dharmanāna | 74 |
sahadeba chāli nuāri bikaḷa tāra mana | 78 |
kāẏā susthakari āmbhe kāli prabhātaru yibā | 79 |
rakha rakha dharma boli sahadeba ḍākadilā | 80 |
hā hā bhāi bolikari koḷa kariṇa dhailā | 82 |
kṣaṇe biśrāma kara he yujheṣṭhi nr̥pabara | 83 |
leuṭi chāhaṁkinā ho paṇḍu jāā suta | 84 |
he rājā yujheṣṭhi tumbhe kṣaṇeka biśrāma
raha raha boli bhīmasena hāka dilā | 87 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ho tu chaḍa sahadebaku
tā puṇye se ailā sinā ẏeteka dūraku | 89 |
yete puṇya karithilā se ẏehu pr̥thīre
tohora ākuḷa hele se na pāi jībana
ẏe baḍa pāpiṣṭha re chaḍa mora bhāi
chāḍi yibākaiṁ sata na baḷai mora citte | 94 |
kemante chaḍibi ẏāku na baḷai sata | 95 |
ẏehā parā bhāiku tu ẏethe chaḍiyibu
hemabanta śikhare yāi kisa tu karibu | 97 |
ẏehākaiṁ na dekhile na rahai mora prāṇa
yujheṣṭhi boile ho ẏehu baḍa doṣī
sarūpa kari kaha deba chaḍibi yebe puṇa | 100 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile ẏe bhūta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā
karakaiṁ chāhiṁle jāṇai tini bhmabana bāratā | 101 |
ẏe mahā pāpīki chaḍa nohasi bimukha | 104 |
bhīmasena boilā ẏe māẏā moha chadi
kadāścite yujheṣṭhi deba neuṭi na chāhiṁle | 107 |
puṇihiṁ mukha chāhiṁ aneka śoka kalā | 109 |
lg.note: prāṇa antara kāḷe sandeha na kahai |(gha, ṛha, ba, ja)

lg.l: bho deba yujheṣṭhi he boliṇa ḍākeka puṇa dilā | 114 |
ājaka rahi sambhāḷi nia kinā gosāiṁ | 115 |
ẏe mora ātmāku lāgila baḍa manda
sambhāḷi kari mote nia dharma narendra | 116 |
āsa āsa boli ūrddhve uṭhile dharmaṁkara bāḷa | 117 |
bajra ghāta jāṇi se padilā bhūmira
bho deba yujheṣṭhi kṣaṇake biśrāma kara
lakṣa rājāṁka upare ẏe bolāi bhmajaṅga | 125 |
kumāra mukhe ẏehākaiṁ ākāśe acchi pāṭa | 126 |
baimātrī suta boli dhaile abā citte
āmbha tahuṁ seneha karithāa ye ẏehānte | 127 |
dharmeṇa nirjata svāmī aṭai yāra deha
ẏebe sodara chaḍi hoila ta nirimoha | 128 |
tāhāṁka nidhane kehna thibā ẏe deha gheni | 129 |
kṣaṇeheṁ tāṁku na chaḍa tumbhe dharma ye yujheṣṭhi
bola nakuḷa sahadeba mohora gaḷā kaṇṭhi | 130 |
kebaṇa bhūta āsi paśilā to hr̥dare
lepana kare aṅge candana paḷe śate | 132 |
puṇi boile brikodara śuṇimā deba yujheṣṭhi
dekhu dekhu se nakuḷa prāṇahiṁ hārilā
ucce robai se ye pabana kumare | 137 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bhīma na kara rodana
ẏeteka pātakī kimpe rahithiba ẏe mahī | 139 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bhīmasena na lagāi muṁhāsa
nakuḷaku chaḍi tu bahana hoi āsa | 142 |
māẏā mohe paḍikari tu nohasi andhatakāra
agyāna mohare tu paḍu kimpe najāṇi | 144 |
yete puṇya arajilā tebe dūrahiṁ aila
ẏete baḍa pāpī re aṭai mora bhāi
ẏe pr̥thīre mattagarba hiṁsā ye karai
nakuḷa chaḍi tu āsa mora bhāi
yete kāndibu āu jībana na pāi | 149 |

lg.note: ẏethaku suhr̥de ahaṁkāra mūḍha prāṇī |(ḍha, ja)

lg.l: pāṣaṇa jhaṇṭi bhūmi hema hoẏe apahāra | 155 |
bho svāmī aśakata hoilā mora kāẏe
sambhāḷi nia he patha acchi aḷapa dūra
kṣaṇake biśrāma tumbhe kara he daṇḍadhara | 158 |
ẏete boli yujheṣṭhi ye bega bega hoi | 159 |
ẏete boli paḍilā se bāseba kumara
bho deba yujheṣṭhi bāre pratikāra kara | 162 |
arjuna paḍilā yahuṁ bhīmasena ta dekhilā
āre mora bhāi boli koḷare dhailā | 163 |
āhāre mora prāṇa sākhā tu bhāi boli
kāndanti yujheṣṭhi deba yānti hema peli | 164 |
kāndai māruti arjuna guṇa ye sumari | 165 |
dekha he arjuna tora paḍilā tora sākhā
kṣaṇeheṁ biśrama kara ẏehāṁku mukha dekha | 172 |
hemāñchaḷe yāiṁ svāmī kisa bhoga karibā | 173 |
dekha tora bhāi ẏe nidhana arjuna
ẏehāku chaḍibāku kesane baḷilā tumbha mana | 174 |
padmadaḷa locana buji niceṣṭa helu bhāi | 176 |
ẏethire mr̥tu tote bidhātā āṇi dilā
ẏe mohora prāṇa nayāi kimpāhiṁ rahilā | 178 |
prāṇara billabha tu yāuchu na kahi
ẏeke ẏeke samaste śoila niceṣṭa hoi | 179 |
śarīre daẏā ta na basai tāhāṁkara | 180 |
arjunaku bhīmasena sneha śoka kalā yete
yujheṣṭhi boile bhīma sarūpa ẏehi kathā
marante ātmāku se na diai sarbasthā | 182 |
yadyapi rodana tu karibu śira koḍi
cetanā pāiṇa ki se jīiṁba bāhuḍi | 183 |
ẏe ye mahata loka paraku upugāri
arjunaku śuāi re āsa mora bhāi
ẏe baḍa doṣī āre aṭai māruti
ẏehi se pāpī re baḍa aṭai mūḍhaātmā | 191 |
śoka nakara āu āsa ture māruti
jagata tāriṇa svāmī ẏe saṁsāru gale
āmbhe kisa mānaba svāmī dharibā deha bhale | 195 |
hemagiri pare yāi ki sukha pāiba | 197 |
mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe jāta hoile abaśya ye mari
aneka prakāre svāmī kalu tote sebā
ẏebe mote chaḍi tumbhe ẏekāhoi na yibā | 202 |
āmbhanta chaḍibāku tora kehne baḷilā sata
kebaṇa daẏita ho harilā tumbha citta | 203 |
yujheṣṭhi boile re śoka nakara tu bhīma
ye yāhā arjai bābu se tāhā bhmañjai
bhīmasena boile mote nia tumbha tule | 207|
ẏekāẏe na yāa dhari nia mora hātha | 209 |
ẏe giribare tumbhe keheneke ẏekākī rahiba
chāḍi na yāa prabhma muṁ tumbhara sodara | 212 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tote keheneke nebi bhāi
tohora ātmā asambhāḷa kemanta pāribu tu yāi | 213 |
tu mote bhīmasena re nakara kaṭāḷa | 214 |
bhīma boilā kṣaṇe biśrāmi mote niasi
ẏete baḍa daẏāḷu hr̥dare nirddaẏā nuhasi | 221 |
tumbhara tule mote nia he nr̥pabara | 222 |
mohora prāẏe bhāiki ho ẏeṭhāre chaḍikari yāi
niścaẏe jāṇili tumbhe nirddaẏā hoila ta
bho yujheṣṭhi rāẏe muṁ tohore śaraṇāgata | 224 |
ye yāhāra puṇya gheni svargapura yāa
āsi yebe nuārilu tuni hoi śua | 226 |
bho dharma yujheṣṭhi muṁ rahilaiṁ ẏetha | 227 |
daśa sahasra matta hāthīra prākarma yāhāra
śuṇa ho manurāẏe badanti agasti brahmabettā
yujheṣṭhi hāka dianti asa āsa ho bahana
yujheṣṭhi boile tuhi pāru yebe chāli
hemabanta śikha āu acchi alpa dūra
bho deba yujheṣṭhi āhe rakṣā mote kara
ẏe mohora ātmā hoẏe mote agocara | 234 |
niasi sambhāḷi svāmī daẏinī ghena mohora
bho deba yujheṣṭhi kṣaṇeka biśrāma kara | 235 |
āra aṅgare āsa kimpāiṁ dukha pāu | 236 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka bole bhīma dakṣiṇa aṅge pelilā
sādhu sādhu sehi ho hemagiri parabate | 242 |

lg.head:
{@yudheṣṭhiraṅka narka darśana o chaẏāṇoi sahasra
rājāṅkara mukti@}

lg.l: hemabanta parbata upare uṭhile yujheṣṭhi mahārājā | 1 |
se parbata upare basai prabhākara rājana | 4 |
ẏehi chāri parbata ye ākāśa adhāsvarga | 9 |
ẏe chāri parbata taḷe nabadīpa sapata sāgara pr̥thī
ẏe parbata chāri chāri diga ābori achanti | 10 |
se hemabanta parbata upare uṭhiṇa yujheṣṭhi
kebaṇa yoge narkagati pāile chaẏāṇoisasra rājā | 14 |
agasti bolanti driyodhana katire yete rājā thile
prathama dine paḍā māgante se śaraṇa paśile | 15 |
teṇukari ākāśe paśita na dile deba yame | 16 |
se dina yujheṣṭhiṁki dekhi pāile narkuṁ sadagati | 17 |
narka draśana kimpe pāile bho agasti | 19 |
kare śahasra thile tāṁku kehi jiṇinohe raṇa | 22 |
aśastamā hata boli śuṇai yebe karṇṇe
tebe se śahasra chaḍai jiṇai tāṁku raṇe | 23 |
pāṇḍabe kūṭa upāẏe ye kale rāti
thāṭhe loḍi droṇe ye napāile droṇī | 26 |
kuru pāṇḍaba beni thāṭhe pachārile guru
samaste boile aśastamāku āu kāhiṁ loḍipāru | 27 |
bābu aśastamā hata tumbhe satakari jāṇa | 28 |
nara kibā guñjara boli na jāṇai tathi | 29 |
āna āu yujheṣṭhiṁkara pātaka nāhṁ kicchi
ẏeṇu dekhiṇa mukati gati pāile rājāmāna | 31 | 878 ||
śuṇiṇa sānanda hoile baibasuta manu rājā
bhrātha sodara nāhiṁ ẏekā hoile yujheṣṭhi
kebaṇa kr̥tya kale se hemabanta śikhare uṭhi | 2 |
lg.note: “ẏeteka mātra mithyā dharmasuta kahiachi” pare ‘ṭa’ pothire pāṭha
se phaḷe dharma nandana narkare kāṇiāṅguṭhi buḍāi
se kāṇi āṅguṭhi goṭi galā kaḷā hoi |
tetiśa koṭi debatā chanti yekameḷi
ẏe phaḷe dharma nandana narka draśana baḷi |

lg.l: bandhu sodara marāi hoili muṁ ẏekā
śvaneka hoi yāiṁ bheṭile nija sute | 5 |
śuṇa ho caitana śukḷāmbara śarīra ye śvānarūpa kāẏe
ẏe mahāhema lāgi deha miḷāibāra bhaḷi
ẏeḍe hema thānare āsi śvāna kemante miḷi | 8 |
ẏeteka bhāḷi deba ārohaṇa bata taḷe
mukha toḷi robai se hoiṇa ākuḷa | 13 |

lg.note:
śvāneka hoiṇa āsi chamureṇa miḷile
phuṭiṇa rahile deba dharmabaṭa taḷe |(ja, ba, gha, ḍha)
lg.l: ẏe śvānara baikulye muṁ jīibaiṁ āu kāhiṁ
ẏe mohora ātmā kimpā dahiya nohilā
ẏehāra kaṣṭa dekhi mora ātmā bisarjilā | 17 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka ākuḷa bikaḷa dekhiṇa ye śvāna
ḍareṇa tharahara se robai ghana ghana | 19 |
tahānta cintā mora na basilā hr̥dara | 22 |
tāhākaiṁ hāde mora daẏāta na basilā | 23 |
ẏehāku bināśa kale mohora dharma nāśa
bhīma arjuna bhāimāne hele baḍa chatrī
tāhāṁkara bāṇe duṣṭamānanta gañjile ẏe pr̥thī | 26 |
tāhāṁku hr̥dare daẏā mora na basilā bhale | 27 |
ẏethu anantare se bilaṁki deśa rājā
bho deba chāri pāṇḍaba dropatī hemabante
ratna aḷaṁkāramāna se bibidha barṇṇe dei
ẏethu anantare śuṇa bilaṁka deśa rājā
kemanta kari se rājya kaleka pāḷana
śuṇa ho rājana tāhā badanti agasti
rājya chaḍi aile ye yujheṣṭhi nr̥pati | 38 |
pitā tāṁku dile pūrba jambudīpa pr̥thī
sandhyā tarpaṇa ye chaḍile deba pitra
baṇija karma kale ye yāhā abihita | 45 |
prasaba stirīẏe se icchanti kāma icchā
mātā pitā teji putre bhārijāre baśa
ḍagare hakāri dine puccha lāka rājā
deśa ucitare se achantinā jana prajā | 53 |
ye yāhāra karmare se achantininā prāṇī
āu kicchi abhāba achu kiho tuhi śuṇi | 55 |
gupate rājāhiṁ ta se deśe deśe buli
parajāṁka ceṣṭāmāna se mane mane bhāḷi | 61 |
gupate rājā ye deśe dekhilā kaḷiyuga
tohora tahuṁ mahāpāpī ye nāhiṁ ẏethuṁ āna
ẏe se abadhya ẏehā badhyakalu kesanamate
tu abā bolibu ẏehā kimpe kalu pucchā
nija karma mohe rata nohai svaicchā | 69 |
muhiṁ parikṣa rājana na jānuṁ ki mote
mohora rājye adharma karu tuhi kemante | 70 |
ẏete boli br̥ṣabha se kahai bacane | 71 |
kaḷi ḍareṇa hoi ye gāba rūpa

div.note:
“mohora carita tuhi śuṇa nr̥pabara” pare ‘ba’ ‘ja’ ‘ḍha’
‘gha’ pothire bhinma pāṭha :–
ẏeka pādeka puṇa abaśya kṣaẏe yiba
tohora rājāpaṇa yāẏe kichu dharma śaba |
tuhita nikaṭe ho maribu ruṣi śāpe |
tu ho rājā ẏetheṁ sandeha nakara
dharma kathā ācari nirate dharma kara |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇe śaraṇa śada muni sāroḷa |

lg.l: muhiṁ dharma ye br̥ṣabha rūpa hoi
mohora ye satya śauca daẏā kṣamā dhailā caupāda
satya chaḍiṇa ẏe tinipāda kalā mora ccheda | 77 |
śuṇi parīkṣa boile muṁ yāuthili loḍi
yogeṇa tuhi ẏebe mohora āge paḍi | 78 |
ẏete boli khaḍaga ye jhāḍidilāka bīra
tote muṁ mārante re jagata upugāra | 79 |
mohora baḷabīryya tu dekhilu re ūṇā
teṇu tu mohora deśe karure gañjaṇā | 80 |
rājya teji banaste se kaleka gabana | 83 |
tohora rājyare na paśi kimpāiṁ bañchai | 84 |
tu mote ho daẏā rājā karibunā ẏebe
prāṇa bikaḷe yebe ture paśilu śaraṇa | 86 |
tote yebe rakṣā muṁ karibiṭi kaḷi
mo rājya chadi yāa tu ānapanthe caḷi | 87 |
kaḷi boilā tumbhe sakaḷa deśe adhikārī
dia mote ṭhāba ẏebe manare bichāri | 88 |
uttarā nandana ye boile mane bhāḷi
ẏe mora bacane yebe thibu pratipāḷi | 89 |
se mūrkhara aṅge ārohaṇ akara tuhi | 90 |
ẏeṭhāre rahile sahi pāriba ki se mohora ārddoḷi | 91 |
anarūpa jāṇi tumbhe bola ho nr̥pati
ẏete ṭhābe tu biśrāma karibu abirata | 94 |
ẏete sthāneṇa tuhi dibā rātre thibu
mamaāgyāṁ kebeheṁ bhraṣṭa ye na karibu | 95 |
dharma dharaṇī ye duhinti chaḍi dilā | 96 |
digabije kale rājā sānanda mane heji | 98 |
biṣṇura mahimāṁ ye sakaḷa deśe kahi
brāhmaṇa purāṇa ye śūdre gīta gāi | 101 |
agha śakaṭā bakā dhenukā ye batsāsura
kahnā abatāre ye nāśile ẏe asuramāna | 106 |
ki se bacana ẏe śubhai adabhuta | 108 |
pitā batsaḷa ẏe ye ajāṁkara kīrati
śuṇiṇa parama sānanda se hoile nr̥pati | 109 |
bāhuḍi āsi rājā nija bhmabane parabeśa
siddhacaṇḍī caraṇe śaraṇa śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa | 111 |
ẏethu anantare ye bilaṁka deśa rājā
ẏebe kaha yujheṣṭhiṁka svarga ārohaṇa bāṇī | 113 |
sākhā sahodra putra bāndhanba mohora kehu nāhiṁ
diga na diśai yibi ye muhiṁ kāhiṁ | 115 |
baibasuta manu śrotā ye badaẏanti brahmabettā
puṣyeka bimāna gheni bege yāasi sahasrākṣa
baṭataḷu deba āsana chaḍiṇa bege uṭhi | 121 |
agni bāṇa nirghāta bāṇa bajrasr̥tī bajrabāṇa
svāmī heḷeṇa bānddhalu tu śūnya aṇachāṣa
pañchabiṁśa prakr̥tira aṭu tu deba sākhā | 128 |
to tahuṁ bitrake āna ke kariba lekhā
tuhi se jagata saẏaḷa pūrāa manobāñcchā | 129 |
svāmī mātāra abikāre sodara śira kāṭi
jagujana mohinī amara biḷāsuṇī cauṣaṭhi koṭi | 130 |
se aṇḍa chaḍiṇa śarīre hoilā sasrayoni | 132 |
svāmī cauṣaṭhi koṭi nāẏekā amara biḷāsuṇī
svāmī jambu datyaku māri kauṇopa darpabhañjā
svāmī dibibhmabana nāẏeka indra ye debatā
śaraṇa jana suhuda durjana baḷa gañjā
sura siddha nāgaloke tuhi se debādhi debarājā | 136 |

div.head: {@yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara dharma parīkṣā o svaśarīre svarga gamana@}

lg.l: śata sahasra daṇḍa praḷamba hoi śoi | 2 |
śuṇīmā muni he yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara svargārohaṇa kathā
kisa pratiuttara dile indra ye debatā | 3 |
bābure pita āgyāṁ dile tu yibure ākāśa
puṣyeka bimāne basi bege yibā āsa | 5 |
tote bāṭa chāhīṁchanti chāla yibā bege | 6 |
indra boile bābu tohora sodara chāribhrāthe
puṣyeka bibāne bije karibā biḷamba nakara tuhi
tohora yibāku se achanti bāṭa chāhiṁ | 9 |
indra debata bacane yujheṣṭhi uṭhile dhātikāre
indra debatā boile ẏe dekhu dekhuṁ śvāna
yeteka basre chuiṁ tete basre srāhāna | 11 |
indra jāṇai se śvāna aṭai dharma ye debatā
ẏehi se deba bibāna dekha ho yujheṣṭhi
śvāna pāmara yiba kedsaneke yiba uṭhi | 16 |
aneka sodar athile mohora se sāhā
mohore sadaẏā thile bibāne ẏehākaiṁ nema | 19 |
bibāne na basāiba ho yebe deba tāta
deba bibāna upare yujheṣṭhi deba bije | 21 |
sadā sadaẏe tohora bābu ẏesaneka manīṣā | 22 |
pāṣaṇe na lāgai yehne jaḷaṁkara ghāta | 23 |
abheda snehare yehne na bhedai śara
svakāẏe svargaku yāi nuārile deha gheni | 25 |
indra boile yujheṣṭhi yāhākaiṁ sumarile tohora māta
nirākāra puruṣa ẏe se dharma daibata | 28 |
cihnabarṇṇa na diśai ẏe pratakṣe nirākāra | 29 |
ẏe se dharmadebatā ṇuṇa go yujheṣṭhi | 33 |
tu hemabanta parbate hoilu āsi yahuṁ ẏekā
tu digambara hoilu bābure tote kehi nāhiṁ sākhā | 37 |
bibāne bijekari bege yāa amara svarge | 38 |
se tote na dekhiṇa bismaẏe matibhāba | 39 |

div.note: bimāne ārohi caḷanti nr̥pamaṇi |(jha, ṭa, ṭha, cha)

lg.l: jaẏa jaẏa dhuni karanti sakaḷa daibate | 49 |
yāna bāhāna ārohi debatā tetiśa koṭi
ākāśabāsī bihantā puruṣamāne digapāḷe kale puṣyabr̥ṣṭi | 51 |

div.note:
ẏe bhaba saṁsāru upuci gale
puṇa utapatti hoibu ẏehikāḷe |(jha, ṭa)

ẏe bhabasāgare utapatti praḷaẏe
puṇa utapatti hoiba galeka samaẏe |(cha, ṛha)

lg.l: ẏemanta samaẏe bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba
āsthāna taḷe bijaẏe chāri ye pāṇḍaba | 56 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya ye śaṁkuni
sata heu ki nisata heu pāile br̥ndāarka bhmabana | 62 |
kr̥ṣṇa ye sārathipaṇe thile arjunara rathe

div.note: amr̥ta apyāne yehne bratanti sakaḷa digapāḷe |(cha)
basile dharmanandana ākāśa sthāna māḍi |(ja, ba, gha, ḍha)

lg.l: brāhmaṇa heu ki caṇḍāḷa heu nakṣatra hoi bhabe | 64 |
ẏekā mātra dhr̥tirāṣṭakaiṁ na dekhile pratakṣe | 71 |
kuru pāṇḍaba samara kale yete ohobaḷa sanya gheni
lakṣe rājā tule padile yeteka saini | 72 |
karṇṇare pibante ye nirmaḷa hoẏe kāẏe
pāpa kaḷuṣa gale yamaku kimpā bhaẏe | 76 |

div.note:
śuṇa he sugyaṁjane mahabhārata dīti
paḍhile śuṇile ye labhiba svargagati |(cha, ja, ka, jha, ṭa)

lg.l: muṁ tāhā bañchāili sujana jana hita | 77 |
dharma artha kāma mokṣa yāhāra yisa bāñcchā
chāṇura ambā kadambā asura darpa dhvaṁsi

div.note:
kāma trodha lobha moha hiṁsā manara saṁśaẏa
samasta nāśa karanti biṣṇara sandeha |

lg.l: kamaḷa toḷante ye kāḷīẏa nāga daḷi
prasanna rūpa dekhi pāilā parama gati | 91 |
dhanu ucchabare dekhibāre hoilā tora icchā
jagatīru paḍiṇa ye kaṁsāsura galā mr̥cchā | 92 |
parama ātmā nirañjana āpaṇe deba gopya
piṇḍa ātmā nīḷagiri bauda śarīra sarūpa | 98 |
he budhajane yābata puṇyathiba tābata bhaja hari
mahāghora narkaru sehi se kariba pāri | 99 |
śrī nārāẏaṇa debaṁka caraṇe laẏe gheni
tāhā lekhana karibāku kisa mora śakye | 103 |
nohai paṇḍata muṁ na jāṇai śāsrabadyā
janame janame mūrkha muhiṁ na jāṇai padasiddhā | 104 |
japamantra śāsra muṁ na jāṇai kicchi
he budhajane jambodīpa bhrathakhaṇḍa oḍarāṣṭa maṇḍaḷe
se mora tuḷasīmāḷā hoi luḷu bakṣasthaḷe | 108 |
he paṇḍita jane prasanna hoile piṅgaḷā
muṁ tāhāi putra hoi se mohora māta
sehi māḷā mohora gaḷāre acchi bhari
yebaṇa nāma dhari saṁsāra jane tari | 111 |
bāḷuta rūpa muhiṁ tāra pratakṣe dekhai
se yāhā kahai tāhā muṁ lekhai | 112 |
se sāraḷā prasanne hoilā mora gyāna
sāraḷā caṇḍī caraṇe mohora hoẏe sebā

div.note: basai kanakābatī pāṭaṇā candra bhāgā nadīkūḷe |(ṭha, ḍha, ja, tha)

bāḷaka rūpa tāra pratakṣe dekhili
śrī debīṁka prasanne muṁ samasta kahili |(ja, ḍha)

lg.l: paḍhile śuṇile ye hoai bahuta puṇya | 116 | 1181 |
basanakuṇḍaḷa ratna ḷa puṣya candana dei
muniẏe śuṇimā paṇḍaboṅgka svarga ārohaṇa kathā
tebe se jāṇibi muṁ tumbhara bacane śuṇi | 4 |
tahuṁ yāiṁ pāṇḍabe miḷile sarayūnadī tīre | 5 |
bhāinta gheniṇa deba hemabantaku karanti bije | 8 |
ghoḷa manthānaru yehne bāhāra hoẏe phena
sehimati prāẏe hoẏe mahī ye udayāna | 9 |
se yebe prāṇa bisarjana āmbhara kisa bratibā
āmbha jībane ābara kisa pra ẏojana | 16 |
tuhi se kāraṇa nātha anya nāhiṁ rakhantā | 19 |
tahuṁ se boile deba śuṇimā yujheṣṭhi | 20 |
ājaka rahibā ẏethe kāli yibā gosāiṁ | 21 |
